text: head down,look down,lower head,lower your head
who=Oliver,when=.5,do=say:Teacher, why did you want to talk with me?+act:interrupt
who=Oliver,when=1185,do=prompt:15 seconds to finish your last question!"

1. Engage,State purpose:"Our goal today is to learn how to pay careful attention to what questions are asking us by using the routine Check & Circle",Reflect student feelings: "You feel worried" or "Your learning is important",Breathe with students,Ask students to read the question: "What is our question?"+2. Teach,Direct: "Check the nouns in the question. What did you check?",Reflect: "You identified the key noun in the question - equipment and water",Direct: Circle the verbs in the question. What did you circle?",Reflect: "You identified discover as the action word in the question"+3. Take-Away,Ask Learning: "What did you learn from the Check and Circle routine?",Ask to Transfer: "What can you do next time you see a question like this?,Reflect on your practice through our survey+4. Tech Tips,Allow agileteacher.org to access your microphone.,Press spacebar to speak. You will see your words transcribed in the toolbar.,Type your words in the toolbar if you have trouble with your microphone.+End practice to reflect on your learning and print certificate
